alert.note: Alert for Conway; Faulkner; Johnson County Higher Elevations; Lonoke; Monroe; Pope County Higher Elevations; Prairie; Pulaski; Southern Johnson County; Southern Pope County (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued March 14 at 3:25AM CDT until March 15 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CDT THIS MORNING... ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM CDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the first Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28. For the second Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 31 expected. * WHERE...Conway, Faulkner, Pulaski, Lonoke, Prairie, Monroe, Southern Johnson County, Southern Pope County, Johnson County Higher Elevations and Pope County Higher Elevations Counties. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, until 9 AM CDT this morning. For the Freeze Warning, from midnight tonight to 9 AM CDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
